definition: a spill in some sport, as a fall from a bicycle, while skiing or being capsized on a surfboard
details:
noun
- a spill in some sport, as a fall from a bicycle, while skiing or being capsized on a surfboard
= example: a spill in some sport, as a fall from a bicycle, while skiing or being capsized on a surfboard
- an event (or the result of an event) that completely destroys something
= synonyms: destruction, demolition
